name: Chain Champs
description:
Fight to save your planet from the enemy planet which it is literally chained to in this multiplayer brawler! Use gravity as your weapon as you launch crates at each other and collect powerups to increase your stance in the fight!

This game was made during Ludum Dare 30! The theme was "Connected Worlds" and I thought it was a good idea to make a game about two literally connected enemy worlds. I also wanted to incorporate multiplayer into it so I made it a sort of brawler! Hope you enjoy!

Music by Harrs.
